Package com.flipfit.business

Interface FlipFitUserService

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitUserServiceOperations
public interface FlipFitUserService
Interface for user-related operations. Provides methods for booking and canceling slots, viewing gyms, and managing user details.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • cancelSlot

      boolean cancelSlot(int bookingId)
      Cancels a slot booking based on the booking ID.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - the ID of the booking to be canceled
      Returns:
      true if the cancellation was successful; false otherwise

    • viewAllBookings

      List<FlipFitBookings> viewAllBookings(int userId)
      Retrieves all bookings made by the user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose bookings are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of bookings made by the user

    • viewAllGymsWithSlots

      List<FlipFitGym> viewAllGymsWithSlots()
      Retrieves all gyms with available slots.
      Returns:
      a list of gyms with available slots

    • viewAllGymsByArea

      List<FlipFitGym> viewAllGymsByArea(String area)
      Retrieves all gyms in a specified area.
      Parameters:
      area - the area in which to search for gyms
      Returns:
      a list of gyms located in the specified area

    • bookSlot

      boolean bookSlot(int gymId, int startTime, String email)
      Books a slot at a specified gym.
      Parameters:
      gymId - the ID of the gym where the slot is to be booked
      startTime - the start time of the slot
      email - the email of the user making the booking
      Returns:
      true if the booking was successful; false otherwise

    • validateUser

      boolean validateUser(String email, String password)
      Validates a user based on email and password.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the user
      password - the password of the user
      Returns:
      true if the credentials are valid; false otherwise

    • createUser

      boolean createUser(FlipFitUser user)
      Creates a new user.
      Parameters:
      user - the FlipFitUser object containing user details
      Returns:
      true if the user was created successfully; false otherwise

    • updateUserPassword

      boolean updateUserPassword(String email, String password, String updatedPassword)
      Updates the password for a user.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the user
      password - the current password of the user
      updatedPassword - the new password to be set
      Returns:
      true if the password was updated successfully; false otherwise

    • updateUserDetails

      boolean updateUserDetails(FlipFitUser user)
      Updates user details.
      Parameters:
      user - the FlipFitUser object containing updated user details
      Returns:
      true if the user details were updated successfully; false otherwise

    • getUserIdByEmail

      int getUserIdByEmail(String email)
      Retrieves the user ID based on the user's email.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the user
      Returns:
      the ID of the user associated with the email

    • getSeatCount

      int getSeatCount(int gymId, int startTime)
      Retrieves the number of available seats at a specified gym and start time.
      Parameters:
      gymId - the ID of the gym
      startTime - the start time of the slot
      Returns:
      the number of available seats
